name: adkiller:uploader.jp
description:
uploader.jp(http://www.uploader.jp/)用広告削除CSS

04/20 仕様変更に対応、誤爆を減らすために一部をコメントアウトしました。以前の仕様に戻したい場合はコメントアウトを外してください。

- - -その他のCSS
http://userstyles.org/users/4626
css:
@-moz-document domain("uploader.jp") {
/*
div[align="left"][style="position: absolute; top: 80px; left: 5px;"],
body#bhome > script:first-child + script + div#header + div#wrapper > div#content > h2,
body#bhome > script:first-child + script + div#header + div#wrapper > div#content > h1#usermesseage,
body#bhome > script:first-child + script + div#header + div#wrapper > div#content > center,
body#bhome > script:first-child + script + div#header + div#navigation + div#wrapper > div#content > h2,
body#bhome > script:first-child + script + div#header + div#navigation + div#wrapper > div#content > h1#usermesseage,
body#bhome > script:first-child + script + div#header + div#navigation + div#wrapper > div#content > center,
body#bhome > script:first-child + script + div#header + div#navigation,
*/
div#navigation a[href="http://www.uploader.jp/rule.html"],
div#recent-news,
object[codebase^="http://fpdownload.macromedia.com/"],
iframe[src^="http://rcm-jp.amazon.co.jp/e/cm?"],
iframe[src^="http://send.microad.jp/mad.cgi?"],
iframe[src^="http://ad.jp.ap.valuecommerce.com/"],
iframe[src^="http://rss.rssad.jp/rss/wbreq?"],
iframe[src^="http://sys.uploader.jp/read.html"],
iframe[src^="http://sys.uploader.jp/lilbox.php?"],
a[href^="http://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/redirect.html?"],
a[href^="http://www.amazon.co.jp/exec/"],
a[href^="http://affiliate.recruit.jp/"],
a[href^="http://nakanohito.jp/"],
a[href^="http://sns.boyslovefan.com/"],
a[href^="http://www.recparty.com/"],
a[href^="http://www.sukotan.com/"],
a[href^="http://sys.uploader.jp/campaign/"],
a[href^="http://www.uploader.jp/contact.html"],
a[href^="http://www.uploader.jp/advertisement.html"]
{display:none!important;}

div#about{width:auto!important;}
div#header + div#wrapper > div#content > *,
div#header + div#wrapper > div#content > * > *{margin:auto!important; padding:0px!important;}
div#header + div#navigation + div#wrapper > div#content > *,
div#header + div#navigation + div#wrapper > div#content > * > *{margin:auto!important; padding:0px!important;}
}
